author: rse
msg: Document the special APACI behavior for installation paths where
``/apache'' is appended to paths under some (well defined, of course)
situations to prevent pollution of system locations with Apache files.

author: fielding
msg: Fixed problem with buffered response message not being sent for
the read_request error conditions of URI-too-long (414) and
malformed header fields (400).  We now create enough of the request
record so that it is adequately logged as well.

author: fielding
msg: Ready to vote on 1.3 issues again.
